meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Preserving National Forests The White House is considering a plan for national forests that would bar new roads on nearly one-quarter of those lands. PAGE A16
Preserving National Forests The White House is considering a plan for national forests that would bar new roads on nearly one-quarter of those lands. PAGE A16
Los Angeles Police Warned The nation's top civil rights enforcement officer warned that Los Angeles needed to make changes in police training and procedures. PAGE A16
Germans Rename a Base Germany renamed a military base for a soldier in Hitler's army who disobeyed orders, saved hundreds of Jews and was executed. PAGE A3
'Kate' Tops Tony Candidates The Broadway musical revival ''Kiss Me, Kate'' received 12 nominations, followed by ''The Music Man,'' with 8. THE ARTS, PAGE E1
Devils Advance to 3d Round The Devils held Toronto to six shots on goal and won, 3-0, to eliminate the Maple Leafs in six games. PAGE D1
